---
title: API Reference
---

Welcome to the Graph-RAG Python API reference. This is a reference for all graph-rag packages.

* [graph_retriever](graph_retriever/index.qmd) - Base package providing traversal functionality.
* [langchain_graph_retriever](langchain_graph_retriever/index.qmd) - Traversal functionality integrated as a LangChain retriever supporting a variety of LangChain `VectorStore`s.
* [graph_rag_example_helpers](graph_rag_example_helpers/index.qmd) - Helpers used in various examples and notebooks.
